content: भौतिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [भूत्-ठक्] {@--1@} Belonging to created or living beings; <ls>Ms. 3. 74.</ls> {@--2@} Formed of coarse elements, elemental, material; पिंडेष्वनास्था खलु भौतिकेषु <ls>R. 2. 57.</ls> {@--3@} Relating to evil spirits. {@--4@} Possessed by evil spirits. --कः <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. --कं {@--1@} A pearl. {@--2@} Anything elemental.
